member.name: T:CompilationExtensionInterfaces.IProcessCompilation
member.summary: Implement this and put the resulting dll in the compiler directory with a name "CompilationExtensionYOUR_NAME.dll" to hook into the compilation process.

member.name: M:CompilationExtensionInterfaces.IProcessCompilation.process(System.Object@,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Untyped, because we can't reference Microsoft.CodeAnalysis due to circular references.
